verses.text: \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wilt \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee,

\w That|strong="H3820"\w* thy \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w may|strong="H3820"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: \w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* know prudence:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H8394"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* incline thy heart \w to|strong="H5414"\w* prudence:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou shalt \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w her|strong="H0518"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* shalt dig \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w her|strong="H0518"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w treasure|strong="H4301"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* giveth \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* cometh prudence \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H4043"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* righteous, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* protect \w them|strong="H6845"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* simplicity.

\w Keeping|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w guarding|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* saints.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w path|strong="H4570"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* please thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*:
Counsel shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H8104"\w* prudence shall \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* thee,

\w That|strong="H1870"\w* thou mayst \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1870"\w* speaketh \w perverse|strong="H8419"\w* \w things|strong="H8419"\w*:

Who \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w right|strong="H3476"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H8056"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w glad|strong="H8056"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H8056"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H8056"\w* most \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w things|strong="H8419"\w*:
\w Whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w*, \w and|strong="H6141"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* steps infamous.

That thou mayst be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w from|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, \w who|strong="H0802"\w* softeneth \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*:
\w And|strong="H0430"\w* forsaketh \w the|strong="H0853"\w* guide \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w her|strong="H7911"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* hath forgotten \w the|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* inclineth unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hell.

\w None|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* hold \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*,

\w That|strong="H4616"\w* thou mayst \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H8104"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* mayst \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* simple \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w continue|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* do unjustly \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* taken \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H3772"\w*.
